name: TripleHop Technologies
overview: TripleHop Technologies provides advanced context-sensitive search, retrieval, and classification software solutions. It offers MatchPoint, an information retrieval solution for the access, classification, and delivery of enterprise information. The companyâ€™s enterprise tools serve the financial services, legal, life sciences, management consulting, media, and other industries to access and share relevant information from sources, including the Internet, corporate networks, and proprietary knowledge bases. TripleHop Technologies also provides industry-specific travel, retail, and employment recommendation engines either in Web site or call center version. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in New York City. The company also has offices in Paris, France; and London.
